website_summaries.verdict: This lamp's highly adjustable positioning makes it easier to treat the shoulders, back, and other hard-to-reach areas.
pros: Standing lamp can easily target back, neck, and shoulders
275W bulb has shield to protect from injuries
Standing lamp with pinch-free spring arm
Lamp has caster wheels for easy positioning
cons: Some lamps have been known to short out unexpectedly
Can be challenging to find replacement bulbs with the proper wattage

customer_reviews.title: I've had this almost 1 year and so far so good. The instructions emphasize the importance of turning the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews complained about quality. I've had this almost 1 year and so far so good. The instructions emphasize the importance of turning the thermostat to the lowest setting before turning off the power. However, I do notice fluctuations in amount of light & heat put out at different settings so maybe it's starting to get tired. I will be disappointed it that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Sridevi

customer_reviews.title: products are guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked really well and it has a dial to adjust the intensity of light and heat emitted. It has recently stopped working after 3 months of use and the company has been very professional and there is no problem communicating with them. They stand by their product and will issue a replacement. I am very satisfied with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chris U.

customer_reviews.title: It was very helpful but I was fortunate to have my problem diagnosed as polymyalgia rheumatica
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of muscle pain (shoulders, hips and legs and found physical therapy of little help. Hot showers were helpful, so I thought a heat lamp might be worthwhile. It was very helpful but I was fortunate to have my problem diagnosed as polymyalgia rheumatica, which has succumbed to Prednisone. I am on the mend and nearly as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Sue and Roy Hatch

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: Just as another reviewer stated: this lamp is not only faulty...it is a fire hazard! In less than 3 months of use it made a fizzy sound and then shorted out of nowhere. Of course, this is after the refund window expired. I have a different heat lamp that has lasted for years with absolutely no issues and was much easier to assemble as well. Save your money and get some slightly more expensive/sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Broken Heat Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heat lump. It make strange noise and I'm so afraid to use it. I used it few times and it's broken already. It is a broken product. It is a poor heat lamp and not safe to use it. Waste of money. I have to say this is not a good heat Lamp compared to other heat Lamps I use.
customer_reviews.author: Ping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister. She really likes it and it seems to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and great for processing highlights.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and easy to put together. Nice and compact for my little salon. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: allioopsie

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had other heat lamps before and prefer this model. The base is sturdy and the dimmer function is great. I had a problem with it 6 months after buying it, and the seller dealt with it expeditiously.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth M Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service was really helpful in getting a replacement part that broke due to user error after the return period was over..
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Warning fire hazard. Wire melted and blew the bulb
customer_reviews.text: Bought and used very lightly, only a few times per month for 6 months. Loved it until the wire that connected to the bulb somehow overheated and melted and blew the bulb. This item was too expensive to have such a short shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi Teubner

customer_reviews.title: very good for indoor sunlight
customer_reviews.text: i bought one for me and one for my brother. we both have ankylosing spondylitis and this helps a lot to reduce inflammation. we use this after applying some pain killer good quality natural oil.
customer_reviews.author: kaps1972

customer_reviews.title: It is great. We use it for a head cold and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great. We use it for a head cold and any other pains. Back pain, Knee pain, Calf pain it is great. The only thing it comes with the wrong light bulb. Make sure you order the 250 Watt infrared red light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: daniela mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Heat without burning perferred
customer_reviews.text: I would have been happier if it was only a heating lamp. I had not expected that you could get sunburned by it. But as I do not wish to tan, I can use it while covered with a blanket so that I benefit from the heat only. The product was easy to assemble and of good quality..
customer_reviews.author: Eve G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LAMP.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Very positional. Very stable. Love the variable intensity control. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Product failed completely.
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after our return window expired, the electrical socket shorted out and burned the wiring harness. The wire used on this unit is too light (18 gauge) for the heat lamp load. This product is a safety hazard (fire) and should be recalled.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Using for my tummy as my acupuncturist recommended this to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite happy with my infrared heat lamp. It's a good thing to have. Every home should have one !!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: item was returned
customer_reviews.text: Item had rust in the bottom of the item. One sheet of instructions written in poor English about weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Nice person

customer_reviews.title: Works well but doesn't last long. I bought mine ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but doesn't last long. I bought mine two years ago but haven't used it in a while. When I went to use it again, there is no heat. Since the warranty is only for a year, I am stuck with a non-functional, for expensive piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goldman

product_meta.title: Infrared Heat Lamp w. Floor Stand - Skin Care and Muscle Therapy
product_meta.description: This is the new and improved version of the Silver Fox infrared heat lamp. This lamp includes the bulb and has been upgraded with heavy duty wiring to improve reliability and longevity. The weighted 5 caster base is very sturdy so you don't have to worry about the lamp tipping at all. You can buy this lamp with confidence as we will always stand behind this product.
feature_bullets: Intensity dial and protective bulb shield included
Warm the skin and relieves tired muscles
Skin Care, Acupuncture, Massage and more
